DefaultEvent.Description: Was it you? Onwards. Quickly. Perhaps you can still make it out.
DefaultEvent.Name: Someone screams

ChildBranches.Name: Fumble in the dark
ChildBranches.Description: Somewhere - somewhere here is the way out. The darkness presses against you. Its breath is hot on your neck.

DefaultEvent.Description: Money changes hand between monks as you emerge, blinking, into the light of their lamps. It is their custom to make bets on the fate of travellers who enter the Citadel. Not all of them are cheering.
DefaultEvent.Name: A cheer!

ChildBranches.Name: Leave
ChildBranches.Description: Here's the wall-crack that leads to the monastery-cellar.

ChildBranches.Name: Silence
ChildBranches.Description: No one is left. Who is even reading this?

SuccessEvent.Description: You've found your way deeper into the Citadel...
SuccessEvent.Name: Onwards!

DefaultEvent.Description: Go back. This isn't where you meant to be. You've gone no deeper, but what's this?
DefaultEvent.Name: Wait -

ChildBranches.Name: Go deeper
ChildBranches.Description: The Citadel lies on its side. All its halls and tunnels tilt crazily. Edge your way through, like an ant through a broken puzzle-box.

SuccessEvent.Description: There you go. Familiar footsteps in the dust.
SuccessEvent.Name: Closer to safety

DefaultEvent.Description: You're going the right way - but you've taken a turn you didn't intend. Where are you?
DefaultEvent.Name: A detour

ChildBranches.Name: Retrace your steps
ChildBranches.Description: Back - out? Up? Before? Very quickly, directions in here become impossible.

Description: $false-star -> 偽星$All the Neath is dark. The Citadel is dark as only a once-bright place can be. It hung up there among the false-stars, drowned in azure light, for... how long? Now it's here. So are you. [Very bad things will happen if you run out of candles.]
Name: $Shattered Citadel -> 砕かれた砦$Exploring the Shattered Citadel
